Mary Markell Buntin

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Bunton; Bunting
  2. Foster Name: Mary
  3. Foster Family: John H. and Hattie Hascall
  4. Location of Family: Ware, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Ulysses, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 5
  8. Date of Birth: , NY
  9. Gender: female
  10. Source: Ulysses Dispatch, 31 May 1899; 1900 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census; Nebraska State Census Collection, 1860-1885 for John Hascall.
